Module azcam.tools.display

Contains the display tool. This tool is often implemented both by server and console.

Classes

class Display (tool_id='display', description=None)

The base display tool for server and consoles. Usually implemented as the "display" tool.

Args

tool_id
name used to reference the tool (controller, display, …)
description
description of this tool

Ancestors

  • Tools
  • ObjectHeaderMethods

Args

keyword
keyword
def display(self, image, extension_number=-1)

Display a file on the image display. If specified for an MEF file, only extension_number is displayed.

:param image: a filename or an image object :param int extension_number: FITS extension number of image, -1 for all :return None:
